title: Revert to a stable working version

requirements.text: Revert the application to the last known stable state before the recent changes that caused issues. Restore both frontend and backend code to the previously working version, ensuring the app builds and deploys successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully to the network
All previously working features (registration, gallery, admin dashboard, CMS content) function correctly
The admin login and dashboard data loading work as expected

Preserve the existing data model and backend state
